If This Sounds like Your Team, Opsee Is for You

You use AWS

You're hosted in EC2. You're writing your own services, and maybe using some AWS services like RDS, ELB, or DynamoDB. You might even be running containers in production. We are too, and Opsee is built to run in AWS.

You're on a Small Team

Opsee is for teams who:

  • May not have full-time ops
  • Don't have time to set up a traditional monitoring tool chain
  • Need monitoring, but don't want to build a NOC

You Build Microservices

Opsee is made for microservices. Teams who write microservices often have developers monitoring the services they write. Instances and services are ephemeral. Opsee is built to work in environments like this.

You Want Effortless Monitoring

You need monitoring — you’re not building a NOC. Opsee helps you quickly set up health and performance checks with useful notifications, without needing an ops specialist to set it up.
